metadata.name: Rayouf Alhumedhi × Sawa Spotlight Collection 001
metadata.description: The Sawa Spotlight Collection showcases inspiring creators from around the world for one-time, special-edition works of art. From the creator behind the Hijab Emoji Project, Rayouf's debut piece pays homage to the variety of sauces used by people around the world to season their food – and the memories that these sauces create.
